website_summaries.verdict: Great for those who want more than a countertop machine but don't have room for a 24-inch model.
pros: Tall tub design maximizes internal space
cons: Consumes an estimated 280 kilowatt-hours per year, which is a relatively high amount

website_summaries.verdict: Though it doesn't have as many features as some competitors and it has limited space, it's a good choice if you need an appliance with a small footprint.
pros: A compact dishwasher with a streamlined design and easy-to-use controls
cons: Not as spacious as other models we considered, but if you have limited space this isn't a concern
Racks aren't adjustable or designed to optimize space
A few reports of leaks originating from the bottom of the unit

customer_reviews.title: You will regret this purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one that I have purchased in three years and it now is malfunctioning. The washer-motor went out in the first one I bought and now the seal is coming loose on my new one! Upon further inspection of the leaking, I found that the spot-welds on the retaining area that holds the seal in place are rusted out already! This dishwasher has only been installed and in-use for approximately 6 months. I would NOT recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and quite
customer_reviews.text: Loving our new little dishwasher. We recently retired and downsized to a smaller house. The kitchen had no dishwasher. Having concerns about giving up so much cabinet space, our plumber suggested a smaller dishwasher, which I never knew existed. After reading all the reviews, and not finding any in stores, decided to order online. If you hire a plumber like we did, be sure to look it over beforehand for dents or damage in case you have to send it back. Ours had a small dent that I felt wouldn't really show. The installation went great. Cleans dishes beautifully and nice and quiet. Perfect for the two of us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for it's size.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little guy due to having a small kitchen, with old school shallow counters. This was the shallowest I could find that still had decent ratings and features. It's been a year and my only issue is that the only detergent that works well in this are the expensive Cascade pods. If you realize that this won't fit large pots and are just looking for something to wash flat wear, glasses, and dishes; you'll be happy with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Faster Tomorrow

customer_reviews.title: Glad I read reviews of drying ability
customer_reviews.text: Glad I read reviews of drying ability, as this machine does a good job of it, worth the extra $150.
customer_reviews.author: Fistandantilus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this daily for a couple of years now and haven't had any problems. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Wharton

customer_reviews.title: ONLINE DW leaked once installed by plumber, bought in store AWESOME DW
customer_reviews.text: The one I ordered online thru Amazon cost me dearly when it leaked all over and my master plumber never had it do that as bad as this. I ordered from a big box store and really live this model. It cleans so much better than my last full size DW. Had to pay my plumber double for install.
customer_reviews.author: Ann with an E, Anne

customer_reviews.title: For a little house with no room, perfect
customer_reviews.text: I installed this by myself over a day, no experience, works great. We have minimal kitchen space so this was perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit but not regular height
customer_reviews.text: Very nice unit. As an FYI though it is not standard dishwasher height, seems aost 2" shorter so had to put a filler panel at the top junction with the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Waywest

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very very pleased. Easy to install, easy to use, had it for 3 weeks and super happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sandrine Beddou

customer_reviews.title: for best usage. Really happy to have a dishwasher that ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well for the size. Read the operating instructions, for best usage. Really happy to have a dishwasher that will fit in my small kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: MandM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install it's running right now it's very quiet
customer_reviews.author: pcmw

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I am still bummed that we didn't have room for a full size dish washer but this 18" works fine. We use regular liquid cascade and use the normal setting. Everything comes clean. I do pre rinse the dishes pretty well first. It is pretty quiet when it runs. We watch tv in the next room and the dishwasher is not disruptive at all. We still have to wash big items by hand.
customer_reviews.author: G. Uhl

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Came damaged from factory - TWICE!!! Returned them and decided to go without a dishwasher
customer_reviews.author: S Zirl

customer_reviews.title: Damaged from the start
customer_reviews.text: We bought this dishwasher three weeks ago based on reviews and just opened the box. It arrived dented and the door does not close fully on the top left side. The plumber will be hooking it up next week. It remains to be seen whether it runs well or leaks. Do not trust the shipping of this product.
customer_reviews.author: lance

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how well it works yet but they sent me the wrong one. We were supposed to get a solid black dishwasher and they sent me the stainless steel. Not much we can do about it sense we only realized when the plumber got here to install it. I'm sure it is a great product but make sure you open the box before your plumber goes to install it so you know if you have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: shanley hanlon

customer_reviews.title: The dishwasher is shorter than my counter, which left ...
customer_reviews.text: The dishwasher is shorter than my counter, which left a big gap between the counter and the dishwasher. I had an old Frigidaire which fit my counter perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Yanhui Deng

customer_reviews.title: ADA compliance leaves a machine that wastes depth and space you should be able to use!
customer_reviews.text: ADA compliance makes this machine a joke. You cannot put in more than one dinner plate front-to-back since ADA compliance makes the machine waste several inches of depth. It is already small, why mess with consumers? If the person using this needs to use ADA, then they will not put the dishes in places they cannot reach in the first place. This wastes precious space that could be used by everyone else. This is a regulation gone bad, to our detriment.
customer_reviews.author: Chip

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't drain, rusting
customer_reviews.text: Have had this less than a year. It does clean well. However, after only 7 washes it had little dots of rust on the inside door and base of the unit inside. A more serious problem is that a few months ago it stopped completely draining after wash cycles, leaving a pool of water in the base of the dishwasher. It does suck the remaining water out at the beginning of a new cycle, but clearly it's not supposed to leave a lake of standing water after a cycle. A technician is scheduled to come out next week for a warranty repair, so hopefully the problem can be resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Meigs

customer_reviews.title: Noisy, Limiting and Wet
customer_reviews.text: This is a noisy-running appliance with racks made to provide limited options for positioning dirty cups, utensils, dishes, cutting boards, etc. After a rinse cycle completes, items must be towel dried upon removal.
customer_reviews.author: Donna K. Mcclish

product_meta.title: Frigidaire FFBD1821MW Built in Full Console Dishwasher in White
product_meta.description: 18" Built In Full Console Dishwasher with 6 Wash Cycles, 10 Place Settings, ADA Compliant, Energy Star Certified, in

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars18 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
